comment: Light floral note on the nose.  No burn associated with a young whiskey. Yummy!!
A fair amount of vanilla and honey. It shows it’s young, would love to see this at barrel proof.
Toffee, honey, young. Almost a raisin at the finish
Just came back into stock in NC. Very smooth proofed at 87. I get alot of vanilla and toffee notes, not much fruit. A rock solid bourbon for $28.
